definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
ethnic township (formal village level subdivision of PRC county)

sentences.english: MHK is the shortened form of the Chinese Proficiency Test for Minorities in China.
sentences.chinese: MHK是中國少數民族漢語水平等級考試的簡稱。

sentences.english: In the Warring States Period, wars often broke out between Zhao and the minority groups in the north.
sentences.chinese: 戰國時，趙國和北方的少數民族之間經常爆發戰爭。

sentences.english: Maiden complain"has been the eternal theme of the female literature of minority nationalities."
sentences.chinese: 古代少數民族女性文學一直演繹着“閨怨”的情緒。

sentences.english: The rock paintings in Cangyuan are the treasure of the Yunnan minority culture.
sentences.chinese: 滄源崖畫是雲南少數民族文化藝術遺產中的瑰寶。

sentences.english: You should not discriminate against minorities.
sentences.chinese: 你們不應歧視少數民族。

sentences.english: Different birth-control policies also apply to some ethnic-minority groups.
sentences.chinese: 不大一樣的還有少數民族的人口控制政策。

sentences.english: The Mongolian script is used by Mongolian nationality that live in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古是一個以蒙古族爲主體的少數民族自治地區。

sentences.english: In India the minority is harrassing the majority.
sentences.chinese: 在印度，少數民族騷擾主體民族。

sentences.english: We should help the minority to develop and get rid of fatuity.
sentences.chinese: 還說什麼我們應該幫助少數民族發展，擺脫愚昧。

sentences.english: In history, there were many large-scale immigrations of the northern minorities.
sentences.chinese: 少數民族曾經有過多次大規模的內遷。

sentences.english: All the minority nationalities are entitled to appropriate representation.
sentences.chinese: 各少數民族都應當有適當名額的代表。

sentences.english: Guanxi University's national minority preparatory course shift certain if rural area registered permanent residence?
sentences.chinese: 廣西大學的少數民族預科班一定要是農村戶口麼？

sentences.english: At the evening party, we also appreciate the various folk song and dance.
sentences.chinese: 在聯歡晚會上我們還欣賞了各個少數民族的歌舞。

sentences.english: Members of 21 minorities live in this area.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區居住有21個少數民族的成員。

sentences.english: Western Guizhou is inhabited by many minority nationalities living in compact communities.
sentences.chinese: 黔西是一個少數民族聚居地。

sentences.english: Xiangxi minorities are cheering for the expressway opening.
sentences.chinese: 湘西少數民族羣衆爲這條“富民路”的開通而歡騰。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
